preamble: A N  A Ct   To   Amend   The   N Ational  E Nterprise  D Evelopment A Uthority   A Ct , N O . 17  Of  2006.
Be It Enacted By The Parliament Of The Democratic Socialist Republic Of Sri Lanka As Follows:

child_level_list.text: This Act may be cited as the  National Enterprise Development Authority (Amendment) Act, No. 18 of 2014.

Section 3 of the  National Enterprise Development Authority  Act, No. 17 of 2006 is hereby amended by the repeal of paragraph ( a ) of subsection (1) of that section, and the substitution therefor of the following:
pre_block_list: Amendment of section 3 of the National Enterprise Development Authority Act, No. 17 of 2006.

child_level_list.text: the Secretary to the Treasury or his representative; and
the Secretary to the Ministry of the Minister to whom the Authority has been assigned or his representative; and.
In the event of any inconsistency between the Sinhala and the Tamil texts of this Act, the Sinhala text shall prevail.
pre_block_list: Sinhala text to prevail in case of inconsistency.
National Enterprise Development Authority (Amendment) Act, No. 18 of 2014 2
